Sentencas: In various technological applications (solid oxide fuel cells, heterogeneous catalysis) ceria based mixed oxides are in contact with alumina used as support or additive.
Titulo: Stability of nanocrystalline Ce-Gd mixed oxide on Al2O3 support

Sentencas: It is thus important to gain knowledge on the possible interactions between the mixed oxide and the alumina at temperatures and atmospheres, corresponding to real processing or working conditions.
Titulo: Stability of nanocrystalline Ce-Gd mixed oxide on Al2O3 support

Sentencas: In this work, structure and chemical stability of Ce0.5Gd0.55O1.75 nanoparticles supported on a high surface gamma-Al2O3 were studied in oxidizing and reducing atmosphere by XRD, TEM, SEM-EDS, STEM-EDS, Raman spectroscopy and H-2-TPR.
Titulo: Stability of nanocrystalline Ce-Gd mixed oxide on Al2O3 support

Sentencas: Application of a reverse microemulsion method enabled the synthesis of highly Gd-doped, homogeneous ceria particles with mean size similar to 2 nm, ideal for the studies on effect of the interaction with Al2O3 support on chemical and structural stability od doped ceria.
Titulo: Stability of nanocrystalline Ce-Gd mixed oxide on Al2O3 support

Sentencas: Poor tolerance of Ce0.5Gd0.55O1.75 nanoparticles to sintering is greatly improved by their dispersion on a high surface alumina support.
Titulo: Stability of nanocrystalline Ce-Gd mixed oxide on Al2O3 support

Sentencas: In oxidizing atmosphere the particles were chemically stable on the alumina up to 1100 degrees C, undergoing little sintering with increase of the mean crystallite size to 7 nm.
Titulo: Stability of nanocrystalline Ce-Gd mixed oxide on Al2O3 support

Sentencas: In hydrogen atmosphere, the stability is limited by complex, chemical interaction between Gd doped ceria and Al2O3 support, which has been studied in detail for the first time.
Titulo: Stability of nanocrystalline Ce-Gd mixed oxide on Al2O3 support

Sentencas: Ce0.5Gd0.55O1.75 nanoparticles started to spread over the support at 600 degrees C into a nanometer thick amorphous layer, and at 900 degrees C crystallized into a mixed (Gd,Ce)(4)Al2O9 aluminate.
Titulo: Stability of nanocrystalline Ce-Gd mixed oxide on Al2O3 support

Sentencas: The (Gd,Ce)(4)Al2O9 aluminate, which is an intermediate phase at the low ceria/alumina molar ratio used, decomposed at 1000 degrees C into tetragonal CeAlO3 and hexagonal GdAlO3.
Titulo: Stability of nanocrystalline Ce-Gd mixed oxide on Al2O3 support

Sentencas: When deposited on Al2O3, Ce0.5Gd0.55O1.75 nanoparticles showed much improved reducibility, especially in low-temperature range (300-600 degrees C).
Titulo: Stability of nanocrystalline Ce-Gd mixed oxide on Al2O3 support

Sentencas: This effect is further enhanced by the spreading of ceria over Al(2)O(3 )occurring during treatment in hydrogen atmosphere at elevated temperature.
Titulo: Stability of nanocrystalline Ce-Gd mixed oxide on Al2O3 support

Sentencas: The nanocrystalline Ce-Gd-O/Al2O3 system prepared by the impregnation with an aqueous solution of Ce and Gd nitrates appeared to be chemically inhomogeneous and less stable in both oxidizing and reducing atmospheres.d
Titulo: Stability of nanocrystalline Ce-Gd mixed oxide on Al2O3 support
